pullrequest.title: Change default cfm parameter value from 0 to 1e-6 to improve numerical behavior.

content.raw: I think we should support zero cfm as default. The change to 1e-6 actually introduced a springy joint with nontrivial stiffness. we should instead fix Dantzig implementation in ode to avoid divide by zero unintentionally.
content.html: I think we should support zero cfm as default. The change to 1e-6 actually introduced a springy joint with nontrivial stiffness. we should instead fix Dantzig implementation in ode to avoid divide by zero unintentionally.
